title: Good Stone Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Ah, Umi-chan, look. This stone is beautiful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re right. It’s a pale, gentle purple.... Perfect for Kanata.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Right!? I thought so too~! Let’s make a bracelet for her using this stone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Alright! ....Ah, this one! I think this stone fits you, Chika!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh? Which? Waah, it looks so nice~! What kind of stone is this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s a “Carnelian”. Look at what it means. Courage, friendship, solidarity, happiness, and calmness....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Calmness, huh.... Well, I don’t think that’s for me.... Ahaha.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, maybe you’re not really a calm person, but you possess the rest. Courage, friendship, solidarity, and happiness. Let me turn this stone into a bracelet for you, Chika.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeh~, you’re flattering me~! But, I’m so happy! Thank you, Umi-chan! Then, I’ll pick the stone for yours, okay? Let’s see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, I’m looking forward to what kind of stone you’ll choose for me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
